citations.narrative:
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 10:30 am on 05/28/2015. The registrant was reached
by phone and it was determined that a representative was not available for the inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Lundy Kendall, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property:  Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 10:30 am on 05/28/2015. The registrant was reached
by phone and it was determined that a representative was not available for the inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Lundy Kendall, Animal Care Inspector
